blogPost.title:
A group of Afghans who worked for The New York Times, along with their families, touched down in Mexico after a harrowing escape from Kabul.

Here's how Mexican officials, unlike their U.S. counterparts, were able to offer them sanctuary, @benyt writes.
https://t.co/nlL5nWaetG
